Introduction
This topic contains information about requesting examinations for IDES participants, including
responsible providers for IDES examinations
disabilities that require examination for IDES purposes
use of prior examination reports in lieu of an IDES examination
DBQs required for IDES examinations
submitting examination requests for IDES participants
remarks MSCs must include in examination requests to Veterans Health Administration (VHA)
types of medical opinions MSCs must request
handling complex medical opinions
limitations on the types of examinations examiners may conduct
uploading examination requests into the eFolder
tracking examination requests
avoiding duplication of effort
examination of pregnant IDES participants
handling cases involving a participant who is too disabled to travel to an examination
requirement forÂ examiner eFolder review
, and
handling requests in which the examination provider is unable to provide required examinations
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
